title: Djmomin
author: Djmomin
content: Topic: Bet365 With Astropay Few days ago Bet365 added Astropay as a deposit withdraw Method, deposit instant withdraw 1-3Hour max,we have enough experience About Bet365, But Astropay is new,so we have to gather knowledge, Astropay : This is an international payment method, We can use it without vpn/proxy,transfer Money internationally, For verification they need id+ live selfie.This didn’t have closing issue like Skrill neteller. So this is the best time to use it,and Grab the opportunity,Lets make money together,I Have enough Stock bet365+ Astropay, you can Place your order any time,i will provide the best service ever,Happy journey with @Mominurvai

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Djmomin on August 01, 2023, 09:18:12 AMFew days ago Bet365 added Astropay as a deposit withdraw Method, deposit instant withdraw 1-3Hour max,we have enough experience About Bet365, But Astropay is new,so we have to gather knowledge,Astropay is new or what did you say? I have used Astropay several times before to fund my bet365 account. But the disadvantage is that you can use it to deposit but you can not use it to withdraw. Quote from: Djmomin on August 01, 2023, 09:18:12 AMAstropay : This is an international payment method, We can use it without vpn/proxy,transfer Money internationally, For verification they need id+ live selfie.This didn’t have closing issue like Skrill neteller. So this is the best time to use it,and Grab the opportunity,In my country, I prefer to use the Mastercard given me by the bank that I am using. Mastercard has a better rate than using third-party services like Astropay. Quote from: Djmomin on August 01, 2023, 09:18:12 AMLets make money together,I Have enough Stock bet365+ Astropay, you can Place your order any time,i will provide the best service ever,Happy journey with @MominurvaiContinue you scam attempt.People should not buy gambling site account. This is against one of the Bet365 rules and if you are noticed to buy an account, your account would be blocked. Open an account (register), get verified and fund your account yourself.Bet365 only restricted in just very few countries. If you are restricted, do not use the gambling site, look for other ways than to have deal with scammers that will scam you.
